Text.Value: *Worse still, you are falling for him. Maybe the Dark Lady wish for your heart to be hers alone.*
*You have been careful to not get too close to your companions. You know that Lady Shar will not approve of distractions.*
*Perhaps your bond with Wyll may have displeased Lady Shar. Might she see him as a malign influence?*
*Worse still, you are falling for him. Maybe the Dark Lady wish for your heart to be hers alone.*
*Worse still, you are falling for her. Maybe the Dark Lady wish for your heart to be hers alone.*
*Worse still, you are falling for him. Maybe the Dark Lady wish for your heart to be hers alone.*
*You have become close to Karlach. Perhaps Lady Shar thinks you are losing focus.*
*The bond with others can be useful, but you must be careful to not overstep the mark. In the end, Lady Shar's counsel is all you need.*
*A mark you have carried for a long time, by the will of Lady Shar.*
*No matter - the Dark Lady does not owe you an explanation. All you can do is press on, and learn from the pain.*
*Worse still, you are falling for her. Maybe the Dark Lady wish for your heart to be hers alone.*
*Yet still, your efforts are met with pain. Whatever lesson the Dark Lady seeks to impart is lost on you, for now. You must press on.*
*The affection you feel is a pleasant distraction, but it must be put to one side, when the Dark Lady demands it.*
*The pain fades, but you remain troubled. What just happened?*
The wound on your hand caused this. What is it?
*Your prayer goes unanswered. Lady Shar must have her reasons. The wound upon your hand is key.*
*You have grown close to Gale - too close, perhaps? Does Lady Shar feel you may be distracted?*
*You have bonded with Astarion in a way that surprises even you - but does Lady Shar think you are distracted?*
The wound upon your hand - the one that never fully heals. What is its purpose?
*A true disciple of the Nightsinger must be careful. She cannot share with others what is not truly hers to give.*
*You do not remember receiving it, or even its true purpose... but its influence over you is undeniable.*
*Your rapport with Lae'zel is surprising - perhaps even troubling, to Lady Shar. After all, your mission to retrieve the artefact put you at odds with githyanki...*
Offer a silent prayer to Lady Shar for her protection.
*It almost feels like it exists to guide you, or punish you. But what did you do to provoke it?*

Synopsis: Fallback shadowheart avatar wound flare.Can happen either on the plains or in the Underdark. Largely centers around the one constant there is, the party, as the reason for the flare up.
